concept.title: How to build ROMs with variants

conbody.p: A variant will define hundreds of features. Use BUILDROM, to build a ROM for a variant. BUILDROM is the unified Symbian platform ROM building tool.

section.title: ROM building specifications
section.p: A variant configuration will be defined in .var file. Specify the VAR file name along with the FEATUREVARIANT keyword.
section.note: For more information on BUILDROM, refer to BUILDROM reference documentation in http://developer.symbian.org.
